var myCredentials = new AWS.CognitoIdentityCredentials({IdentityPoolId:'us-west-2_jV4C12bpf'});
var myConfig = new AWS.Config({
  credentials: myCredentials, region: 'us-west-2'
});

AWS.config.update({
  region: "us-west-2",
  endpoint: 'https://dynamodb.us-west-2.amazonaws.com',
  // accessKeyId default can be used while using the downloadable version of DynamoDB. 
  // For security reasons, do not store AWS Credentials in your files. Use Amazon Cognito instead.
  accessKeyId: "AKIAJ2HAZJ7TQ3V4FM2Q",
  // // secretAccessKey default can be used while using the downloadable version of DynamoDB. 
  // // For security reasons, do not store AWS Credentials in your files. Use Amazon Cognito instead.
  secretAccessKey: "GoBN++Wg7hd0Yqk+RkPzLk0fWph3xKANDUwRMutD"
});

var docClient = new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient();
var dateArray = [];
var timeArray = [];
var epochArray = [];

function queryData() {
    // document.getElementById('textarea').innerHTML += "Querying for movies from 1985: ";

    var params = {
        TableName : "wake_up",
        KeyConditionExpression: "hello_world = :world",
        ExpressionAttributeValues: {
            ":world":"hello"
        }
    };

    docClient.query(params, function(err, data) {
        
      for (var i = 0; i < data.Items.length; i++) {
          var myDate = (new Date(data.Items[i].date_time * 1)).toString().split(" "); 
          dateArray[i] = myDate[1] + " " + myDate[2] + " " + myDate[3];
          var myTime = myDate[4].split(":");
          timeArray[i] = myTime[0] * 3600 + myTime[1] * 60 + myTime[2] / 1;
      }

      var ctx = document.getElementById("myChart");
      var myChart = new Chart(ctx, {
          type: 'line',
          data: {
            labels: dateArray,
            datasets: [
                {
                    label: "",
                    fill: false,
                    lineTension: 0.1,
                    backgroundColor: "rgba(75,192,192,0.4)",
                    borderColor: "rgba(75,192,192,1)",
                    borderCapStyle: 'butt',
                    borderDash: [],
                    borderDashOffset: 0.0,
                    borderJoinStyle: 'miter',
                    pointBorderColor: "rgba(75,192,192,1)",
                    pointBackgroundColor: "#fff",
                    pointBorderWidth: 3,
                    pointHoverRadius: 5,
                    pointHoverBackgroundColor: "rgba(75,192,192,1)",
                    pointHoverBorderColor: "rgba(220,220,220,1)",
                    pointHoverBorderWidth: 2,
                    pointRadius: 3,
                    pointHitRadius: 10,
                    data: timeArray,
                    spanGaps: false,
                }
            ]
          },
          options: {
              title: {
                display: true,
                text: 'Every morning I push this AWS IoT button and it logs it on this graph!',
                fontSize: 16
              },
              scales: {
                  yAxes: [{
                      ticks: {
                          callback: function(v) { return epoch_to_hh_mm_ss(v) },
                      }
                  }]
              },
              tooltips: {
                callbacks: {
                  label: function(tooltipItem, data) {
                    return data.datasets[tooltipItem.datasetIndex].label + ': ' + epoch_to_hh_mm_ss(tooltipItem.yLabel)
                  }
                }
              },
              legend: {
                display: false
              }
          }
      });

        function epoch_to_hh_mm_ss(d) {
          d = Number(d);
          var h = Math.floor(d / 3600);
          var m = Math.floor(d % 3600 / 60);
          var s = Math.floor(d % 3600 % 60);
          return ((h > 0 ? h + ":" + (m < 10 ? "0" : "") : "") + m + ":" + (s < 10 ? "0" : "") + s);
        }

    });
}
	queryData();
